Package homework1

Class ImpossibleSizeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • homework1.ImpossibleSizeException

  • public class ImpossibleSizeException
extends java.lang.Exception
    ImpossibleSizeException is an Exception caused by invalid size. The exception provides a default valid size by using the method getDefaulSize.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int DEFAULT_HEIGHT  
      private int DEFAULT_WIDTH  
      java.awt.Dimension validDimension  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ImpossibleSizeException​()
      Currently nothing will happen if ImpossibleSizeException is thrown, but the object of exception can be asked to provide default valid size using getDefaultSize method.
